actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to require the conveyance of the Cheraw Fish Hatchery to the State of South Carolina.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to convey to South Carolina all U.S. right, title, and interest to the Cheraw Fish Hatchery. Requires reversion if the property is used as other than part of the State's fishery resource management program.

titles.title: A bill to require the conveyance of the Cheraw Fish Hatchery to the State of South Carolina.
